title: DMT, RGD granted permission to operate- Army Commander

title: Sri Lanka all set for Expo 2020 Dubai
snippet: EXPO 2020 DUBAI is the latest edition of World Expos held around the world since 1851 and will be the first ever to be held in the Middle East, Africa, and South Asia.Sri Lanka will participate in the mega-event which commences in October (1 October 2021 - 31 March 2022) and is expected to attract over 25 million visitors to Dubai during its six-month run.

title: Adolescents to be vaccinated only under medical care at Hospitals
snippet: The adolescents will be vaccinated with Pfizer's COVID-19 jabs only at hospitals under medical care, a minister said. The government has taken a decision to give Covid jabs to all those aged between 15 and 19 following recommendations by the experts' committee appointed in this regard.
